glosses: in time, over time, as time goes by

examples.text: Samsun eski yıllarda iç göç alan bir şehirdi ama bu konumu zamanla kaybetti.
examples.translation: Samsun used to be a city that receives domestic immigration but in time it lost this position.

etymology: From zaman (“time”) + -la (instrumental suffix), equivalent to zaman + ile.
